title: Katherine First - Sweet Spot
description:
Artist: Katherine First
Album: Sweet Spot

Katherine First, spiritual leader and world-class violiner/fiddlist, has at long last achieved musical perfection.  Never before has the simple undulation of a string conveyed such complex emotion.  First is the first to express the "true self" through music, and in doing so gives the listener a glimpse of the naked human soul, an experience so overwhelming and awe-inspiring that it is difficult not to release your bowels in a fit of confused, raw, whirlwind emotion.  

So throw on a heavy duty trashbag and prance to the light-hearted "Barefoot Jig", go underwater to discover a magical world in "The Mermaid", have just what the doctor ordered in "Medicine Bow", and meet God herself in "Katherine's Lament".  Happy listening!

Track Listing

1. The Island of Woods (3:05)
2. Frost is Over/Barefoot Jig/Out in the Ocean (3:07)
3. Archibald MacDonald of Keppoch/Monday Morning Reel/Julia Delaney (5:46)
4. Dusty Windowsills/Jig of Slurs (3:45)
5. If Ever You Were Mine/Paddy Fany's Reel (6:34)
6. Medicine Bow (4:19)
7. Nancy's Waltz (3:47)
8. Calliope House/Sailor's Wife (2:19)
9. Katherine's Lament (5:09)
10. A mhaighaean mhara (The Mermaid) (4:48)
